title: My alpha league has disappeared
body:
Hi

I was playing a normal game and just finished with a lost and when I left the game the alpha client froze and deleted its self.
 
Did this happen to anyone else or just me

replies.body: Reinstalling alpha seems to fix it.

Same here, put my laptop on sleep and when I turned it back on, I couldnt find the launch. 
#BlameTrump2016
Ahhhhh Weird thing... Mine just did that as well. :|
I've reinstalled the client twice and still can't get in
Update just reinstall and say yes to overwrite. You should be fine.
Same here, turned my computer on and shortcut is gone. Went to direct startup file and it just gets stuck on trying to update client at 0% :(
Mine disappeared as i was logging on thing afternoon. idk why, Riot please help.
Mine has done the same, played it earlier today and it was fine. Went to play some more a few hours later and the client and all the data was gone. =/ No idea.
